verbs.description: President Donald Trump and his lawyers [V: are] weighing in on the broad scope of executive power , especially when it comes to a self - pardon .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump and his lawyers] are [V: weighing] in [ARG1: on the broad scope of executive power] , [ARGM-ADV: especially when it comes to a self - pardon] .
President Donald Trump and his lawyers are weighing in on the broad scope of executive power , especially [ARGM-TMP: when] it [V: comes] [ARG1: to a self - pardon] .
